servers.description: ETL API for Azure Face API

post.summary: Get attributes and features of faces in the uploaded image
post.description: API can be used to detect human faces in an image and returns the face rectangles and faceIds, and optionally with location, features, landmark, emotions, characterstics, and noises.

location.description: Send true if you want face location in the image: face pixel position in the image

features.description: Send true if you want face features in the image: headPose, glasses, facialHair, makeup, accessories, hair

landmark.description: Send true if you want face landmarks in the image

emotions.description: Send true if you want the emotions of the faces in the image: smile, emotion

characterstics.description: Send true if you want face characterstics in the image: age, gender

noises.description: Send true if you want noises on the faces in the image: occlusion, exposure, noise, blur

azureId.description: You can send your own azure key

post.description: Find the similarity between the face and someone in face list

faceId.description: If you've faceId of the person you're trying to match

faceListId.description: If you've faceListId of the person you're trying to match to

largeFaceListId.description: If you've largeFaceListId of the person you're trying to match to

faceIds.description: If you've a collection of faceIds which can contain the person you're trying to match to

azureId.description: If you've faceId of the person you're trying to match

post.description: Find the similar person from the person group/large person group

faceIds.description: If you've a collection of faceIds which can contain the person you're trying to match to

personGroupId.description: If you've faceListId of the person you're trying to match to

largePersonGroupId.description: If you've largeFaceListId of the person you're trying to match to

azureId.description: If you've faceId of the person you're trying to match

post.description: Create temporary group for quick assessment.

faceIds.description: If you've a collection of faceIds which can contain the person you're trying to match to

azureId.description: If you've faceId of the person you're trying to match
